Title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
Writer: Adam Cozad, David Koepp, Tom Clancy (based on characters created by)
Actors: Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner, Kenneth Branagh
Plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert C.I.A. analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
Production: Lorenzo di Bonaventura, Mace Neufeld Productions
